title: Direction of electric field at center of square

content.question: What is the direction of the electric field at point C ?

choices.label: An arrow pointing horizontally to the right
An arrow pointing horizontally to the left
An arrow pointing up and to the left
An arrow pointing down and to the Ieft
An arrow pointing down and to the right

content.answer: An arrow pointing down and to the right

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
